meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin Beach Paul Wampler Roger Mueller-Kim Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6081.

div.div: IBM Challenge mini-documentary: "What is a Grand Challenge?"

td.p: Erin Beach, a graduate student of English originally from Bradenton, Florida
Paul Wampler, a web programmer from Knoxville, Tennessee
Roger Mueller-Kim, a high school social studies teacher from Dublin, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,401)

tr.td: BOOK NAMES
GETTING INTO CHARACTER
DON'T HAVE A COW, MAN
WOMEN IN CHARGE
FASHION DESIGNERS
4-LETTER "S" WORDS
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with that letter.)
